title: Short-run effect of increase in the price of oil

content.question: What is the most likely short-run effect of an increase in the price of oil, a key input for production?

choices.label: An increase in long-run aggregate supply
A reduction in the unemployment rate
An increase in real gross domestic product

topic.text: 3.6: Changes in the AD-AS Model in the Short Run

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
